description: This file defines a single asynchronous function 'callBackendGenerate' that communicates with a backend API endpoint '/api/generate'. It checks environment variables for the API base URL, constructs the full URL, performs a POST request with a prompt, and handles errors by throwing exceptions.

methods.name: callBackendGenerate(prompt)
methods.description: Asynchronously calls the backend '/api/generate' endpoint with a prompt; returns the JSON response or throws an error if the request fails.
